description.overview: Intuition represents your access to inner knowing, psychic awareness, and ability to sense what isn't visible.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Uranus and Neptune transits to your natal Uranus, Neptune, and key houses (8th = hidden knowledge and psychic depth, 9th = intuitive wisdom and insight). Uranus brings sudden flashes of insight and breakthrough awareness. Neptune opens psychic channels and dissolves the veil between conscious and unconscious. When these planets form supportive aspects, your intuition is reliable and you receive clear inner guidance. Challenging aspects create confusion between intuition and fear, or overwhelming psychic static. Both retrograde reduce intuitive clarity by 20%.

primary_planets.uranus: Sudden insight, breakthrough awareness, lightning-bolt intuition
primary_planets.neptune: Psychic channels, dissolving the veil, mystical knowing

secondary_planets.pluto: Deep psychological insight and penetrating awareness

key_houses.8: Hidden knowledge, psychic depth, penetrating insight into what's beneath the surface
key_houses.9: Intuitive wisdom, higher knowing, philosophical and spiritual insight

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum intuitive impact - profound knowing or overwhelming confusion
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between intuition and logic
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - intuition flows naturally and reliably
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - distinguishing intuition from fear
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for intuitive insight

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Validating and practical about psychic/intuitive experience - not woo-woo
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize trusting gut feelings, acting on inner knowing, intuition is reliable today
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize intuitive quiet, logic is fine today, not every day requires psychic awareness
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Help distinguish intuition from anxiety - fear contracts, intuition expands
avoid: Making them feel crazy for intuitive experiences

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Your intuition is sharp and reliable today - trust those gut feelings and inner knowing, even if you can't explain why.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: You're picking up intuitive signals but they're mixed - give yourself time to sort what's real insight vs. anxiety.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Intuition feels muffled or confusing today - rely more on logic and let your inner knowing rest rather than forcing it.
